Description.Text:
Position The hotel is situated in a central position, at a few hundred meters from the train station and from the beach (150m.) In the direct closeness there are numerous shops and restaurants.
Restaurant Hotel Jean Marie offers bed & breakfast (buffet or in the room).
Hotel Jean Marie has no restaurant but it has 2 restaurants at 200m away from the hotel, at Hotel Restaurant Arma and Hotel Restaurant Svizzera where you get a discount by showing the card that will be given to you once you are checked in.
Outside SOLARIUM TERRACE: On the roof of the building there is a solarium terrace with sun chairs, sun beds and tables for pleasant moments of relax.
Lobby
More Informations Check-in starting from 12:00. Hotel Jean Marie has its own 2-floor guarded private underground parking, directly reachable by an elevator. The access of the car will take place by means of a hydraulic lift.
